document.full_text: a new york court has temporarily put financially ailing nassau county into the hands of a state overseer, but the judge will decide at a later date whether the county should remain under state control, officials said on monday.
document.title: ny court oks nassau county state takeover--for now
lines_and_colors: a new york court has temporarily put financially ailing nassau county into the hands of a state overseer, but the judge will decide at a later date whether the county should remain under state control, officials said on monday.
